page.title: 20ARCHAEOLOGY
page.content: THE OLD PLACE IS SITUATED ALONG BOSTON RD.THERE IS EVIDENCE OF A MAJOR IRON AGE SETTLEMENT WHICH CONTINUED INTO THE ROMAN PERIOD.AN OLD ROMAN ROAD CALLED KING STREET RAN THROUGH THE SITE. COINS HAVE BEEN FOUND ALONG WITH A FEW BURIALS.THIS WAS THE ORIGINAL SITE OF OLD SLEAFORD AND ST GILES CHURCH WAS HERE. SOME OF THE FINDS WERE COIN MOULDS ALONG WITH POTTERY,GLASS AND A HORSES SKELETON. THERE WAS EVIDENCE OF TANNING,WEAVING AND METALWORK. FIVE SKELETONS THOUGHT TO DATE FROM EARLY MEDIEVAL TIMES HAVE BEEN FOUND ALONG WITH SOME SAXON POTTERY TODAY A NEW HOUSING ESTATE IS BEING BUILT ON THE SITE. { ELSPETH SALMON AGE(12)}
